committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to provide for the extension of a hydroelectric project located in the State of West Virginia.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of a certain licensee, to extend the time required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project located in West Virginia, so as to terminate on September 26, 1999. Instructs the Commission to reinstate any expired license for such project and to extend the time required for commencement of construction until September 26, 1999.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the extension of a hydroelectric project located in the State of West Virginia.
